init.title: Magic Areas
init.description: This integration is automatically configured on load. You don't need to manually add the integration on this UI. Your Magic Areas should be already on the integrations page. Use Home Assistant's built-in areas to create new ones and manage entities.

abort.not_supported: This integration is automatically configured on load. You don't need to manually add the integration on this UI. Your Magic Areas should be already on the integrations page. Use Home Assistant's built-in areas to create new ones and manage entities.

select_features.title: Feature selection
select_features.description: Select the features you want to enable for this area. Each feature will be configured in subsequent steps.

data.overhead_lights: Overhead lights (Leave blank for all area lights)
data.overhead_lights_states: States which overhead lights are turned on
data.sleep_lights_states: States which sleep lights are turned on
data.accent_lights_states: States which accent lights are turned on
data.task_lights_states: States which task lights are turned on

feature_conf_area_aware_media_player.title: Feature: Area aware media player
feature_conf_area_aware_media_player.description: Configure the area aware media player feature

data.notification_devices: Media Player devices used for broadcasting
data.notify_on_sleep: Allow notification devices in this area to play notifications when on sleep mode

data.aggregates_min_entities: Minimum number of entities of the same device class required to create aggregates.

secondary_states.title: Secondary states
secondary_states.description: Map an entity state to an area's secondary state which are used by features to more precisely control devices automatically.

data.dark_entity: Entity used to track area dark state
data.sleep_entity: Entity used to track area sleep state
data.accent_entity: Entity used to track area accented state
data.extended_time: Area will be marked as 'extended' after being occupied for N seconds

area_config.title: Area options
area_config.description: Configure basic options for the area.

data.presence_sensor_device_class: Device classes of sensors to be considered presence sensors
data.clear_timeout: How long since last presence event should it wait before clearing the area
data.sleep_timeout: How long since last presence event should it wait before clearing the area when on sleep mode
